name: SherWeb
description:
Increase agility and better align IT costs by hosting your Exchange, SharePoint and Lync solutions in the cloud with one of Microsoft’s most trusted providers. Get the exact solution you need with customizable and affordable plans, full migration, 24/7 expert technical support and personalized service.
Our key markets:Our technical expertise and customer-service know-how allow us to successfully adapt our offering to meet the specific needs of our 3 key markets:• SMBs, primarily in North America, Europe, South America and Africa• Large corporations looking for an experienced team able to build and support highly customized hybrid or dedicated hosted environments• ISPs, VARs and IT consultants around the globe seeking a trusted supplier of Microsoft hosted solutions for resale
READ MORE...
